Aniket Masaye

Data Science Enthusiast and Physics/Mathematics Graduate

As a highly skilled data science professional with a background in physics and mathematics, I bring a wealth of expertise in cutting-edge technologies and innovative methodologies. Through hands-on experience and continual learning, I have mastered advanced techniques in AI/ML, including transfer learning with transformer-based models. My proficiency extends to optimizing API operations, ensuring robust data management, and enhancing multimedia experiences through ML techniques. Additionally, With a passion for leveraging data to drive insights and solutions, I am eager to contribute my skills and expertise in Data Scientist field.

Work Experience

Data Scientist - Interactly Solutions

Dec 2023 - Now

  • Transfer learning with transformer-based models Implemented cutting-edge technologies like transfer learning with transformer-based models and utilized OpenAI-Whisper for audio transcription, improving accuracy and accessibility of audio content.
  • Efficient API Operations and Data Validation Leveraged FastAPI migration and Pydantic for enhanced performance and robust data validation, ensuring seamless API operations and data integrity.
  • Optimized Data Management Optimized data management with AWS RDS and SQLAlchemy, facilitating secure and scalable storage solutions and streamlined database connectivity.
  • Enhanced Multimedia Experiences Enhanced multimedia experiences through techniques like interpolated frames with TensorFlow Hub's FILM, improving video playback smoothness, and explored pitch-based audio differentiation methods for normalizing AI audio cloning outputs, elevating audio processing quality.
  • Language Processing Advancements Contributed to language processing capabilities by developing a custom Python package for Indian Soundex, enhancing the matching accuracy of similarly pronounced words.

Data Science Intern - Interactly Solutions

Aug 2023 - Nov 2023

  • AWS S3 and Postman Proficiency Leveraged AWS S3 and Postman to enhance understanding of cloud storage and API testing.
  • Flask-Powered Python APIs Mastered the creation of Python APIs using Flask, facilitating seamless data communication and integration.
  • Efficient Video Manipulation Streamlined processes and boosted efficiency in multimedia projects through automated video manipulation with ffmpeg.
  • In-depth Research on Lipsyncing Conducted comprehensive research on lipsyncing in videos, exploring advanced techniques and methodologies.
  • LipGAN Model Application Applied the open-source LipGAN model to produce high-quality lipsync videos, merging theory with practical application.

Data Science Intern - AI Variants

Apr 2023 - Jul 2023

  • Developed an Ensemble Model Created a machine learning ensemble model by combining LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) neural network and Holt-Winters exponential smoothing model. This approach allows for accurate predictions of future stock market prices.
  • Django Web Application Built a web application using the Django framework to deploy and showcase the ensemble model. The web application provides an interactive platform for users to explore and interact with the stock market price predictions.
  • Website Availability Hosted the Django web application on PythonAnywhere and made it publicly accessible. The website allows users to access the predictions and interact with the features provided.
  • Continuous Learning Acquired knowledge in machine learning techniques, time series forecasting, web development, and deployment through this project. Demonstrated a commitment to continuous learning and the ability to apply new skills effectively.
Projects

Sentiment Analysis on tweets

March 2023

I conducted sentiment analysis on tweets and replies related to Elon Musk. By mining data from Twitter, I developed a Naive Bayes model to predict the sentiment of future tweets.

Image Caption Generator

Feb 2023

I developed an image caption generator using a pre-trained model from Transformers. This application generates multiple captions for any given image, providing descriptive and contextual information. The app has been deployed on Streamlit, allowing users to easily utilize this image captioning functionality.

Food Delivery App Data Analysis

Jan 2023

I worked on real world dataset of Zomato app. I used Python & SQL for preprocessing & Statistical Analysis and derived useful insights.
